author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINS AND STRONG WINDS SPREADING ACROSS NEW ORLEANS... ...800 PM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINS AND STRONG WINDS SPREADING ACROSS NEW ORLEANS... ...800 PM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 8:00 PM CDT Wed Sep 11
 the center of Francine was located near 29.6, -90.8
 with movement NE at 17 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 980 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.
